articles.author: Chris Scullion
articles.title: The suit from The Batman was briefly added to Arkham Knight on the Epic Games Store | VGC - Video Games Chronicle
articles.description: The new free skin was added with little warning…
articles.content:
A new skin was briefly added to the Epic Games Store version of Batman: Arkham Knight.
The new skin let players use the suit from The Batman, the 2022 movie starring Robert Pattinson as Batman.

articles.title: Borussia Dortmund team bus gets parking fine in Tynemouth - BBC.com
articles.description: The German Bundesliga club beat Newcastle United 1-0 in Wednesday's Champions League tie.
articles.content:
The Borussia Dortmund team bus has been slapped with a £50 fine while parked up in Tynemouth.
It follows the club's 1-0 win over Newcastle United at St James' Park in Wednesday's Champions League ga… [+1828 chars]
